patch.description: Update an instance of 'LengthMeasures' with the given payload of type 'LengthMeasure' in JSON format and with the specified id.

delete.description: Delete an instance of 'LengthMeasures' with the specified id.

post.description: Create an instance of 'LengthMeasures' with the given payload of type 'LengthMeasure' in JSON format.

get.description: Retrieve a collection of 'LengthMeasures' with all or some selected properties in the given order by specifying the given filter condition.

tags.name: LengthMeasures
tags.description: This entity enables you to manipulate 'LengthMeasures'. It defines the length and width measure units that are used for item records.
